issues.description: Rule 'Any-Any-Rule' allows traffic from any source to any destination using any application
Rule 'Any-Any-Rule' has no log setting configured
Rule 'Any-Any-Rule' has no security profile group assigned
Rule 'Any-Any-Rule' is shadowed by a previous rule
Rule 'Any-Any-Rule' may be redundant with: Allow-Web
Rule 'Disabled-Rule' is shadowed by a previous rule
Rule 'Disabled-Rule' may be redundant with: Any-Any-Rule

recommendations: Review and remove disabled rules to clean up the rulebase
Replace 'any-any' rules with more specific rules for better security
Configure logging for all rules to enable proper monitoring and troubleshooting
Assign security profiles to all rules for threat prevention and content filtering
Remove or reorder shadowed rules that will never be evaluated
Consolidate redundant rules to simplify management and improve performance
